entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
